page.description: Defines the in-line style for the repeating row container.
page.discussion: The repeating row is contained in a DIV. You can set the in-line style for this DIV. For example, yo may want to put a border around the repeating row. To do this, you can set the in-line style:
page.note: While you can style elements in the UX Component using in-line styles, a better approach is to use CSS classes. Use the [Repeating row container class name] property to set the repeating row class.
